thread.title: CBS' Josh Elliott is fired | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: CBS' Josh Elliott is fired | Daily Mail Online

author: Snejana Farberov For Dailymail.Com
title: CBS' Josh Elliott is fired | Daily Mail Online
text: CBS anchor Josh Elliott is mysteriously fired days after announcing 'he would be taking on a bigger role at the network' Josh Elliott, 45, had been lead daytime anchor for CBSN, CBS's digital channel, since March 2016 Announced on-air that Friday was his 'last day' because he'd be moving to CBS News But it is alleged that network executives did not know of his announcement ahead of time and were blindsided CBS News confirmed Monday that the network and Elliott 'are parting way' and he will no longer be reporting for CBS Published: 20:14 GMT, 13 February 2017 | Updated: 20:40 GMT, 13 February 2017 7 shares
